Row.Text: 如果您只有一座城，每进入一个时代[ICON_Science]科学和[ICON_Culture]文化+30%，例如古典时代+60%。对城邦无效。
如果您一共有二座城，每进入一个时代[ICON_Science]科学和[ICON_Culture]文化+20%。例如古典时代+40%。对城邦无效。
如果您一共有三座城，每进入一个时代[ICON_Science]科学和[ICON_Culture]文化+10%。例如古典时代+20%。对城邦无效。
如果您有四座或更多的城，[ICON_Science]科学和[ICON_Culture]文化+0%。对城邦无效。
If you only have 1 city, every time you enter a new era, you get +30% [ICON_Science] science and +30% [ICON_Culture] culture. For instance you get +60% in Classical Era. Not for city-states.
If you have 2 cities, every time you enter a new era, you get +20% [ICON_Science] science and +20% [ICON_Culture] culture. For instance you get +40% in Classical Era. Not for city-states.
If you have 3 cities, every time you enter a new era, you get +10% [ICON_Science] science and +10% [ICON_Culture] culture. For instance you get +20% in Classical Era. Not for city-states.
If you have 4 cities, every time you enter a new era, you get +00% [ICON_Science] science and +00% [ICON_Culture] culture. Not for city-states.
